website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive option for brewing, yet it uses a commercial gradestainless steel.
pros: Pot has a sharp looking finish, using stainless steel
Considering its price point, this kettle will stand up to regular use without showing wear
Works nicely for frying a turkey or cooking seafood, in addition to brewing beer
cons: Does not include a temperature gauge

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kettle but Lacks Side Markings
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel kettle has a decent thickness and feels very well made. I used it today for home brewing and it worked very well. However, I do have one complaint, the kettle does not having etchings in the sides indicating how many gallons/liters it is filled up to.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brew pot for smaller batch beers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brew pot for smaller batch beers. Do yourself a favor if you're doing Brew in a Bag with it. Pick up Reflectix insulation from homedepot/lowes and wrap the kettle in it with some foil tape. It will not only help insulate the pot to hold a mash temp super stable, but also helps you boil in half the time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and immediate availability
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and immediate availability. I was disappointed this didn’t have interior gallon marks. I use this for homebrew and it would make things a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: phillipcjackson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for heating dishwater in our dry cabin. Once water is hooked up I will use it for brewing. I used to biol down maple sap for syrup and this would be great for that purpose. This pot is sturdy and of good quality. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Guy

customer_reviews.title: Molten Glass in a pot
customer_reviews.text: I spent a while looking for a Hot Glass bucket after I ladle out our glass blowing furnace. I dumped scoop by scoop of molten glass and kep adding water as it boiled out with no discoloration on the outside or warping of the pot. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thomley

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Kettle
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, it's a quality kettle, and can't be beat for the price. I use this for brewing 2.5 gallon BIAB batches and it works perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: El Nino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavier construction than I expected. Manufactured well and I'd buy again
customer_reviews.author: john bollack

customer_reviews.title: The taller profile worked out great for my small stovetop
customer_reviews.text: The taller profile worked out great for my small stovetop. It sure seems sturdy enough after using it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: TO GET FIVE GALLONS IN IT YOU HAVE TO FILL IT ALL THE WAY TO THE BRIM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this sooner. Very sturdy and I noticed I had more of an even boil when getting my work ready. Nice and roomy especially when using a multi step hop process.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parra

customer_reviews.title: cheap material. lasted for two boils before leaking
customer_reviews.text: thought this would be of reasonable quality , but it was not. when i was cleaning it for my first use i noticed that the seam on the pot was very visible, and that there was a small brown rust like crack on that seam. i decided to try it out and after the second time using it i noticed that it was leaking from a series of pinholes in the bottom of the pot. this material must be too thin. Amazon refunded my money so i cant complain too much, but now i have to find another pot.
customer_reviews.author: J ferryman

customer_reviews.title: This pot is really sturdy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This pot is really sturdy and heavy duty. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my husband and he wanted something larger and with a basket, so we ultimately returned it. But the pot is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This kettle does the trick for heating up my Sparge ...
customer_reviews.text: This kettle does the trick for heating up my Sparge water. The lid fits on way too tight. The metal is fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brew
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for brewing or any cooking needs you may need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well enough, but the type/grade of stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough, but the type/grade of stainless steel is not ferromagnetic meaning that it does not work on induction stove tops. So, if you have an induction stovetop this will not work. I wish I would have known that before I bought the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettle!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Decent gauge on the stainless. Love the riveted handles. I use it to brew beer and to make large batches of chili. I will buy again if I ever need another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: good for occasional use ..it is not very sturdy and will not hold up to frequent use
customer_reviews.author: question everything

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle for 3 gallon batches or decoctions
customer_reviews.text: As a newbie, I didn’t realize that this would be too small for a 5 gallon batch. Thought about returning it but decided to keep it, now I’m using it every brew day. Quality built kettle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Indwoods

customer_reviews.title: Works great, high
customer_reviews.text: Using to brew 2 gallon batches of beer. Works great, high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid pot but mine had a slight outward bow ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid pot but mine had a slight outward bow on the bottom which made it do a little dance when heating up on a glass top stove.
customer_reviews.author: J. Waxmonsky

customer_reviews.title: Great for homebrewing
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I've been using it to brew lots of beer, with no issues. Measurement lines on the inside would be a lot more helpful
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: All around great
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week boiling down maple sap. Once the season is done I'll clean it and geet ready to start brewing ale. All around great product
customer_reviews.author: anthony mercer

customer_reviews.title: Small hole
customer_reviews.text: Nice pot for brewing but found out it had a small hole in the side while heating water for mash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you cant heat 5 gallons in it but well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice pot well made only problem I have with it is you can't heat 5 gallons in it maybe 4 gallons at a time
customer_reviews.author: James a Schoullis

customer_reviews.title: best kettle
customer_reviews.text: what a great kettle> I boiled maple sap for 12 hours and the handles never got hot and the kettle didn't warp or scorch.it is very good quality. I will be purchasing another one .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: High quality thick stainless. Works well with induction plate. I use for smaller experimental batches of home brew. At a very reasonable price, this exceeded my expectations. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Showed up with a hole
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It showed up with a tiny hole at the bottom of pot prior to any use.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: This is not a 5 gallon pot
customer_reviews.text: Reason for 2 star is the fact that this is not a 5 gallon pot, its more like a 4 gallon pot.
customer_reviews.author: Fab

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, solid value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Stainless Steel. Sturdy. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for induction cooktops
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pot believing that it is made out of stainless steel as advertised. I have an induction cooktop. Now I tried it out and it doesn't work. The pot is made from non-ferro materials. So I can't use this pot. However two stars because it is a very nice pot, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Busch

customer_reviews.title: Great for super batches of chili...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pot for large batches of chili on game day and so far I love it. I haven’t had any issues with sticking or staining. The build quality is great for a pot in this price range and so far the only complaint I have which is very minor is the lid fits extremely tight. I would highly recommend this pot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L.

product_meta.title: Gas One Stainless Steel Brew Kettle Pot 5 Gallon 20 Quart Satin Finish with lid/cover for Beer Brewing, Crawfish, Crab Pot Thickness 0.8mm Commercial Grade Perfect for Boiling Sap for Maple Syrup
product_meta.description: Size:5 gallon/20 quartFrom home-brewing to peanut-boiling, the gas one stainless steel kettle is the perfect fit for your needs. Durable, aesthetically appealing, and reliable, this pot will give you the tools you need to cook whatever your heart desires. With a satin finish, the stainless steel kettle will both compliment your project area and do its job. Your 5-gallon ALPHA stainless steel kettle can handle anything you throw at it-whether it be turkey frying, crab-boiling, or simply just wanting to heat up a huge amount of water. This kettle is a great companion for your cooking.
feature_bullets: High quality stainless steel- very easy to clean, long lasting, safe and durable, good heat conduction, sleek look
1.0mm thickness- heavy- duty and thicker than competitors, commercial grade material, will last for an extremely long time, sturdy and durable
Satin finish stainless steel- Classic, sleek look; visually appealing and fitting of any setting, does not show scuffing or marks, there is no staining and no rusting
Heavy-duty- extremely strong, dependable and well-constructed, will last for a very long time
Comes with lid - makes the heat stay in pot, ensures even levels of heat while cooking, keeps moisture in pot, fast cooking and boiling speed, for cooking crawfish, crabs, home brewing, turkey fry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
